summary: Test suites for the Amused diffusion pipelines (text‑to‑image, image‑to‑image, and inpainting). They combine fast unit tests that use mocked components with slower integration tests that run the real models, checking that outputs are consistent across different batch sizes, precisions, devices and image resolutions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the Amused generation pipelines across diverse deployment scenarios, enabling reliable product features and reducing regression risk.
